sam: PREFIX : <http://samsquire.com/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> CONSTRUCT { <http://samsquire.com/> :hasIdea ?ideas . ?ideas dc:title ?name. ?ideas dc:description ?description } WHERE { ?ideas a :Idea . ?ideas dc:title ?name. ?ideas dc:description ?description. }
